General.Name: Binani Industries Limited
General.Description: Binani Industries Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides media and publication services in India and internationally. It operates through Media, Logistics, and Zinc and by Products; and Other Products segments. The company engages in the publishing of newspapers, journals, and periodicals; construction of hospitals, hostels, university buildings, bridges, and other projects; and manufacture of clinker/cement, zinc, sulphuric acid, and cadmium. It is also involved in the cement, glass fiber, and infra business; civil construction; engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) works, as well as captive projects and outside contracts; and provision of consultancy services. Binani Industries Limited was founded in 1872 and is based in Mumbai, India.
